Name: Navigator
Text: I dumped the last of the barrels.

Name: Navigator
Text: Hopefully this jury-rigged petrol tank doesn't blow us to bits.

Name: Navigator
Text: ...I keep seeing that thing from the cliffs, man.

Name: Navigator
Text: Or at least I think I see it. Through the winds and shit.

Name: Navigator
Text: That's no mountain. That's a fortress.
